member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Contain extension methods defined for the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Return the MD5 hash of a string.
member.param: The string whose hash the method computes.
member.returns: The 128-bit hash of the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the string can be interpreted as the
member.returns: True if the string can be converted to the "true".

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the first letter to uppercase.
member.returns: The input string with capital first letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the substring between and starting from index.
member.param: The left delimiter of the result string.
The right delimiter of the result string.
The start position of the search.
member.returns: The substring that is between and searching from or System.String.Empty if or don't occur within the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Replace all Cyrillic letters in a string with their Latin counterparts.
member.returns: A string in which all instances of Cyrillic letters are replaced with their Latin equivalents.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Replace all Latin letters in a string with their Cyrillic counterparts
member.returns: A string in which all instances of Latin letters are replaced with their Cyrillic equivalents.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the Cyrillic letters to their Latin equivalents and remove all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the period ".") in a username.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the Cyrillic letters to their Latin equivalents, spaces to hyphens and remove all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the period "." and hyphen "-") in the input filename.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a substring of this instance which starts from the beginning and whose length is the lesser of the string's length or .
member.param: The number of characters to get from the string.
member.returns: A string containing the first characters of the input string if available or the whole input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Extract the extension from the filename.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the file extension to the corresponding content type for the specified file extension.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Convert array of characters into array of bytes.
member.returns: A byte array containing the specified set of characters.

member.name: M:StringExtensionsDemo.Main
member.summary: The entry point of the application.
